title: Java Comments
subject: Java
theory:
Comments are ignored by the compiler. They are for humans.

*   `//` Single line
*   `/* ... */` Block
*   `/** ... */` Javadoc (Generates HTML documentation).

common_mistakes.correction: You cannot nest `/* ... */` inside another `/* ... */`. It fails.

practice_problems.problem: Write a Javadoc for a class.

real_world_use_cases.description: Libraries MUST have Javadoc so IDEs can show popups explaining methods to users.

exam_notes: Comments do not increase compiled file size.
summary: Code tells you how, comments tell you why.
